value.title: StarCraft 2: GAME OF THE YEAR! (So Far)
value.excerpt: Goblin versus Krystianer in an epic game of professional StarCraft 2. It's a bit early to call it the best game of SC2 of this year already, but it surely is the best so far. In this Protoss versus Protoss neither player ever manages to secure a solid economy so an intense micro battle is the only option.

value.title: StarCraft 2: He Is PRETENDING To Be AFK?! (Viewer Games)
value.excerpt: Two games of StarCraft 2. In the first one we watch a match where Florencio gets a taste of his own medicine, and in the second one a Protoss player pretends to go AFK at the beginning of the match while building a Nexus on the other side of the map.  Florencio on Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/florenciosc

value.excerpt: Best-of-5 series of professional StarCraft 2 between herO (Protoss) and ByuN (Terran). This series is the Grand Finals of the ESL Open Cup 153 America and showcases a lot of unorthodox buildorders. This is the current Zerg versus Protoss StarCraft 2 meta. From a turtling Sky Toss based approach, we now see a very heavy focus on Gateway
